ThingDef.label: desert salve
ThingDef.description:
A soothing desert-born remedy, crafted by blending cooling aloe vera with the healing essence of cactipine quills.

<color=#E5E54C>Trade considerations:</color>

<color=#E5E54C>Ingredients:</color> Making 10 desert salves requires 10 aloe vera salves and 2 cactipine quills for a total value of 110, and sells for 20, giving a <color=#33CC33>45%</color> profit per unit.

<color=#E5E54C>Value per work:</color> Recipe requires 750 work, which results on a value per work of <color=#33CC33>0.27</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Caravan trading:</color> Its weight is 0.05 Kg, for a value per Kg of <color=#33CC33>400</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Profit per day:</color> On average, and assuming a constant cactipine quills farm, profit per day is <color=#33CC33>0.70</color> (for reference Yayo is 0.35).

<color=#E5E54C>Extra use:</color> Desert salves can be applied to reduce the severity of an infection by 5%.

ThingDef.label: sky syrup
ThingDef.description:
A rare, glimmering syrup distilled from aerofleet blue gel. Light as air yet richly sweet.

<color=#E5E54C>Trade considerations:</color>

<color=#E5E54C>Ingredients:</color> Making 25 sky syrup requires 75 blue gel for a total value of 75, and sells for 6.50, giving a <color=#33CC33>53.85%</color> profit per unit.

<color=#E5E54C>Value per work:</color> Recipe requires 650 work, which results on a value per work of <color=#33CC33>0.25</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Caravan trading:</color> Its weight is 0.05 Kg, for a value per Kg of <color=#33CC33>130</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Profit per day:</color> Profit per day will depend heavily on the size of your aerofleet farm.
